subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: I hail from the Tower of Oracles. Are you the keeper of this fiery door?

subtree.speaker: Statue
subtree.line: Yes, walker. Only I can grant passage. What brings you into this corner of Mirari's abyss?

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: It is my charge to protect the life of our King.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Thus, have I travelled through dream upon dream seeking answers.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: A trusted source has informed me that a key to the consipiracy on his life lies behind that door, this solemn corner of Mirari's mind.

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: Well, I shall not grant passage to you.

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: There is nothing for you here.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: I see. How long have you guarded this door, creature?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: The rage of this door has held fast for eight summers in the making.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: All of eight summers?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: The grievances perpetrated by the King are immense and hard to bear. Mirari's grief is boundless.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: But why must you guard this place? Surely grief is better shared than harbored deep within.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: Grief is part of the problem. Another part is Strakos. Prove to me that you know of the problem.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: For there is grief in my heart as well.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: What anger do you hold?

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: An anger burning bright. I have wondered through these dreams endlessly it would seem.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: An anger burning bright. I have wondered through these dreams endlessly it would seem.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: And yet I do not feel much closer to finding the truth.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: Your master likely holds ill will for my homeland. I cannot help but anger.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: I know what your heart feels. If you wish to bear the heart of fire. I must challenge you to strike me down. I cannot dispel the curse until you do.

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: I need to pass through and you will not stand in my way.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: And how do you suppose to do so?

choices.speaker: Oracle
choices.line: By striking you down where you stand?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: I am rage. I am Mirari's spirit of vengeance. Do you think that I could buckle so easily?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: No, but I hold dominion over you with my staff.

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: You dare?

choices.speaker: Guardian
choices.line: You must attack me!
